sentence.Network_en: Take a spare tire along in case of need.
sentence.Network_cn: 带个备用轮胎去,以备不时之需.

sentence.Network_en: Every car should carry a spare tire.
sentence.Network_cn: 每辆车子应带一个备用轮胎.

sentence.Network_en: The trunk is opened, nothing in there but a spare tire.
sentence.Network_cn: 行李箱被打开, 在那里没有什么,只有备用轮胎.

list.abs: 汽车常用英文术语 - 豆丁网 ... SPACER-RR STRUTINSU 垫片 195 Spare Tire 备用轮胎 SPARE TIRE ASSY 备胎总成 196.
潮词英译别“再囧途”！ - 华枫论坛 ... 路痴 to have no sense of direction 游泳圈 spare tire 赞 to be fabulous.

auth_sentence.content: What he did in his spare time is irrelevant.
auth_sentence.res_content: What he did in his spare time is irrelevant.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What he did in his spare time is irrelevant.

auth_sentence.content: This meant a top-eight finish to spare national blushes.
auth_sentence.res_content: This meant a top-eight finish to spare national blushes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This meant a top-eight finish to spare national blushes.

auth_sentence.content: Spare ribs and salad with the celebrity pig farmer.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Spare ribs and salad with the celebrity pig farmer.
